options.name: help
options.desctription: Shows the details of the specified option.
options.example:
hspcui --help a
hspcui --help syspath=
--syspath="C:\hsp351" hspcui --help a
options.note:
If you want to use the --syspath= or -E or --lang= option, specify it before this option.
Do not add "-" to the option you want to look up. It may be executed.

options.name: a
options.desctription: The character code of the source code is automatically determined.
options.note: If the character code is utf-8, an AssemblyInfo.hsp file will be generated and [#include "AssemblyInfo.hsp"] will be inserted in the first line of the source file.

options.name: c
options.desctription: Compile as HSP var2.6.

options.name: C
options.desctription: Change the current directory to the directory where the source files are located.

options.name: d
options.desctription: Add debug information and compile.

options.name: D
options.desctription: Delete the compilation artifacts other than the auto-executable file.

options.name: E
options.desctription: Ignore any errors that occur in hspcui and continue execution
options.note: Using this option is very dangerous. We recommend that you do not use it.

options.name: i
options.desctription: Indicates that the source file is utf-8.
options.note:
If you do not know the character code of the source code, use the -a option.
An AssemblyInfo.hsp file will be generated and [#include "AssemblyInfo.hsp"] will be inserted in the first line of the source file.

options.name: j
options.desctription: Indicates that the source file is shift_jis.
options.note: If you do not know the character code of the source code, use the -a option.

options.name: m
options.desctription: Create an auto-executable file.
options.note: If you need to generate a packfile, use the -P option.

options.name: o
options.desctription: Specify the name of the output object file (.ax) or strmap.
options.note: An AssemblyInfo.hsp file will be generated and [#include "AssemblyInfo.hsp"] will be inserted in the first line of the source file.

options.name: outname=
options.desctription: Specify the name of the output object file (.ax) or strmap.
options.note: An AssemblyInfo.hsp file will be generated and [#include "AssemblyInfo.hsp"] will be inserted in the first line of the source file.

options.name: p
options.desctription: Only preprocess.
options.note: The template function and search function can be used at the same time.

options.name: P
options.desctription:
Creates a packfile from the specified source code.
It can be removed by using the -D option.

options.name: r
options.desctription:
Executes the specified source file and outputs the exit code.
Also, when the -m option is specified, the compiled auto-executable file is executed.

options.name: r=
options.desctription:
Executes the specified source file with the specified arguments and outputs the exit code.
Also, when the -m option is specified, the compiled auto-executable file is executed.

options.name: r0
options.desctription: Shows the runtime of the specified source file.
options.note: The specified source file will not be executed.

options.name: s
options.desctription: Creates a strmap from the specified source file.
options.note:
The -d option is disabled and executed.
Requires hspcmp.dll with HSP 3.6β2 or higher.

options.name: u
options.desctription: Encodes the source file in UTF-8 and outputs the character string data in UTF-8 format.
options.note: This option is set automatically in the linux version.

options.name: w
options.desctription: Set the debug window display flag

options.name: syspath=
options.desctription: Specify the HSP system folder.
options.note: Required if hspcui does not exist in the HSP system folder.

options.name: compath=
options.desctription: Specify the common folder.

options.name: rtmpath=
options.desctription: Specify the runtime folder.

options.name: temp
options.desctription: Copy the templates\default directory to the current directory.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: temp
options.desctription: Copies the specified template directory to the current directory.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: tempd
options.desctription: Delete the templates\default directory.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: tempd=
options.desctription: Deletes the specified template directory.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: tempa=
options.desctription: Copies the specified directory to the templates directory.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: tempo=
options.desctription: Specify the directory name at the copy destination.
options.note: You can check the details of the template function with "help template".

options.name: template
options.desctription: template-desctription.txt
options.example: See each option for an example.
options.note: template-note.txt

options.name: h
options.desctription: Searches for the specified HSP instruction.
options.note: Use the --online option when searching online.

options.name: online
options.desctription: Search online when searching for the -h option.

options.name: lang=
options.desctription:
Specifies the run-time language. The languages that can be specified are ja or en.
The default language is ja.
options.note:
This option must be specified first.
The -E option does not work for this option.

options.name: profile=
options.desctription:
Executes the specified profile. 
Details can be found with --help profile.
options.note: This feature has a lot of caveats. Please use it after understanding the specifications well.

options.name: profile
options.desctription: profile-desctription.txt
options.note: profile-note.txt

options.name: version
options.desctription: Shows the version of hspcui.
options.note: Cannot be used in combination with other options.

options.name: license
options.desctription: Shows the license for hspcui.
options.note: Cannot be used in combination with other options.

options.name: platform=
options.desctription:
Specify the platform.
You can specify either x86 or x64.
options.note: An AssemblyInfo.hsp file will be generated and [#include "AssemblyInfo.hsp"] will be inserted in the first line of the source file.

options.name: see
options.desctription: Shows the options specified in hspcui.

options.name: notasminfo
options.desctription: Does not generate the AssemblyInfo.hsp file.

options.name: nologo
options.desctription: Does not display copyright information.

options.name: oldcmpmes
options.desctription: Display the compile message as before.
options.note: Use it only if you think there is an error message that is not displayed.

options.name: profilea=
options.desctription: Adds a profile with the specified profile ID or profile name.
options.note: If it already exists, it will be overwritten.

options.name: profiled=
options.desctription: Deletes the profile with the specified profile ID or profile name.

options.name: refname=
options.desctription: Change the name of the source file to be displayed.

options.name: tmppath=
options.desctription: Specify the templates folder.
